Articles.Content:
This plane is based on the F-5 Tiger II, which was said to be affordable and has low maintenance... I'm sure there's a number of people who made this kind of plane, so I decided to show mine. At certain angles it looks like an F-16, but it has its intakes on the sides and it has two engines.

I studied the diagrams of the plane as I was building it. It's a bit unstable when steering or rolling because of the rudders I placed into the tail.

Craft file: http://www./view/bjc1xgpcjy72ct1/F-5_Tiger.craft
